channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Project Inheritance Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Project Inheritance Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2198|2024-08-04T07:01:41.160Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20project%20inheritance%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Project Inheritance Plugin 19.08.02 and earlier does not redact encrypted secrets in the 'getConfigAsXML' API URL when transmitting job config.xml data to users without Job/Configure.

item.title: CVE-2020-2197|2024-08-04T07:01:41.113Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20project%20inheritance%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Project Inheritance Plugin 19.08.02 and earlier does not require users to have Job/ExtendedRead permission to access Inheritance Project job configurations in XML format.
